global.title: Global Support
global.description: Worldwide network of service and support

company.title: About ATI
company.subtitle: Leading the future of semiconductor inspection and metrology
company.ceoMessage1: ATI has been at the forefront of semiconductor inspection and metrology technology for over two decades. Our commitment to innovation and excellence has made us a trusted partner for leading semiconductor manufacturers worldwide.
company.ceoMessage2: We continuously invest in research and development to deliver cutting-edge solutions that meet the evolving needs of the industry. Our global network of experts ensures that our clients receive the highest level of support and service.
company.ceoMessage3: As we look to the future, we remain dedicated to advancing semiconductor manufacturing through precision, innovation, and unwavering commitment to quality.

historyEvents.2000: Company founded in Incheon, South Korea
historyEvents.2015: Opened offices in key markets worldwide

company.networkDescription: Our global presence ensures that we can serve customers wherever they are located.

equipment.title: Our Equipment
equipment.subtitle: Advanced semiconductor inspection and metrology solutions
equipment.noEquipment: No equipment available at the moment. Please check back later.

investors.title: Investor Relations
investors.subtitle: Committed to creating long-term value for our shareholders
investors.overviewText1: ATI is committed to delivering sustainable growth and creating long-term value for our shareholders. We maintain transparent communication with our investor community and provide timely updates on our financial performance and strategic initiatives.
investors.overviewText2: Our strong financial position and innovative technology portfolio position us well for continued growth in the semiconductor inspection and metrology market.

board.title: Board of Directors
board.description: Our experienced board provides strategic oversight

news.title: News & Press Releases
news.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest news and announcements from ATI

careers.title: Careers
careers.subtitle: Join us in shaping the future of semiconductor inspection technology
careers.joinUsText1: ATI is a dynamic and innovative company at the forefront of semiconductor inspection and metrology technology. We are looking for talented individuals who are passionate about technology and innovation.
careers.joinUsText2: Join our team and be part of a company that values creativity, collaboration, and excellence. We offer a supportive work environment, competitive compensation, and opportunities for professional growth.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We encourage creative thinking and innovative solutions to complex challenges.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Teamwork and open communication are at the heart of our success.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from product development to customer service.

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: We invest in our employees' professional development and career growth.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team for inquiries and support
